result.purpose: Unit tests for various functionalities in the application, ensuring correctness and reliability.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each test file corresponds to a specific functionality or module of the application, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

tests/batch_sig_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the GetClaimRewardSig function in the RewardHandler.

tests/hash_to_addres_test.go.purpose: Unit test for converting a hash to an Ethereum address.

tests/http_parse_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for parsing URLs and validating hostnames.

tests/http_template_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for parsing and executing an HTML template.

tests/quest_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for streak calculation in wallet check-in logs.

tests/siwe_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for verifying the signature and recovery of messages in the SIWE protocol.

tests/slack_alert_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the Slack alert service functionality.

tests/utils.go.purpose: Defines a no-operation logger for testing purposes.
